review: Well worth the money.  Integrated seamlessly. Needs a longer power cord
author: Edward W Gerard

review: Cheap enough but not the best streaming device that I have owned. It buffers for ever.
author: James Harding

review: Quits working and starts buffering and freezing after about an hour or so of use. Resetting it does not solve the problem. It could be a great product if they get the bugs worked out of it!! As many bad reviews as it has, I should have known better, but I am an optimist and tried to give it a chance...
author: Robert D.

review: I am having trouble with this device for a week and having trouble watching a movie without interrutions.
author: Barbara

review: I was impressed how customer support was able to help me connect my sons IPad to the YouTube channel so he can project YouTube from iPad to the television. I looked for specific reviews to see if the stick did it but now I know 100% the stick does mirror your YouTube on you TV from a iPad
author: botfly
